extendedInfo.description: eHarmony, the #1 trusted dating site, has helped singles find deep and meaningful love for more than 10 years. We are committed to connecting you with highly compatible single matches â even when youâre on the go.  Approximately 5% of US marriages begin on eHarmony! By downloading the free mobile app, you can: â¢ Sign up for eHarmony for FREEâ¢ Complete your Relationship Questionnaire for FREEâ¢ Receive your  detailed Personality Profile for FREE â¢ Receive your daily matches for FREEâ¢ Send Icebreakers to your matches for FREEâ¢ Communicate with your matches for FREE during our FREE Communication eventsâ¢ Communicate with your matches freely within our app, by subscribing to our service Weâd love to hear your feedback! Please email us at usersupport@eharmony.com. The eHarmony mobile app is better than the dating apps for Skout, Zoosk, OkCupid, Plenty of Fish or Match.com. Unlike other dating sites, where a great photo is all that matters, eHarmony takes online dating to the next level, by taking into account things like common personality traits, interests, values, and beliefs.  And as the only site in category that matches singles based on extensive scientific research, our success speaks for itself.Features added since version 1.0â¢ Update your profile while on the goâ¢ Swipe to archive your matchesâ¢ See Whoâs Viewed You via the Match Updates featureâ¢ Send icebreakers for FREE directly from a profileâ¢ Snap and upload photos directly from your deviceâ¢ Import photos from your Facebook account (OS 2.2 and above)â¢ Communicate with your matches using eHarmony Mailâ¢ Get started on eHarmony in less than 10 min with our mobile optimized questionnaire!â¢ Support for OS 2.2 and above â¢ Easily communicate with your matches by subscribing right from your mobile deviceâ¢ Review your Personality Profile or Premium Personality Profile, which has been created just for you!  Other things you need to know:â¢ eHarmony is safe and secureâ¢ You can visit us online at http://www.eharmony.comâ¢ You can view our privacy policy at http://www.eharmony.com/privacy/policy/â¢ You can view our Terms of Use at http://www.eharmony.com/about/termsâ¢ You must be at least 18 years old to download and use this app

reviews.title: Don\'t bother
reviews.comment: This app does not have the flexibility of other online dating apps. I also have found very few decent matches. Communication method is awful. Overall very underwhelmed and I don\'t know to get my money back...You\'d be better off with OK Cupid IMHO. Happy hunting!
reviews.author: Eric P. Rose

reviews.title: Just use the browser!
reviews.comment: If I could give it 0 stars I would! It serves no purpose other than looking at matches, it won\'t send my messages and when I it does work every once in a while it\'ll send the message 4 or 5 times!! And it takes foreverrr to load!
reviews.author: Kristin Hall

reviews.title: Unable to locate server
reviews.comment: Today I get \"cannot locate server\" when logging in. You need to fix this! It worked yesterday!
reviews.author: Ted Zoromski

reviews.title: A Good App
reviews.comment: This app is user-friendly and I don\'t get many error messages at all. But I have seen the Apple version of this app and it\'s much easier to use with a better interface. Why can\'t eHarmony have the similar layout for Android users?
reviews.author: Stefanie James

reviews.title: Not good!
reviews.comment: Constantly stuck at \'Loading Match Details\' screen. There are features that are not included that are on the website format. When scrolling your communications tab, the new message logo appears on all different matches whether there is a new message or not and it is always changing who it says new messages are from. The new website layout is a miss and so is  this app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: They say its completely free... hehehe its not, its waste of time to enter all my info and at the end they ask for credit card,  can someone explan to me how its free !!!???
reviews.author: Wissam Malko

reviews.title: See the matches but doesn\'t update
reviews.comment: The app is great for looking at matches initially but it doesn\'t update the communications or any other sections. It has potential but isn\'t there yet...
reviews.author: Karen Whittaker

reviews.title: Come on, eHarmony...
reviews.comment: For all the money you get, can\'t you make a sensible app? Now the \"Whit If?\" Tutorial messages won\'t go away. I do everything they say but can\'t see matches\' photos with the dumb tutorial box in the way! Fix this, please.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: OBVIOUSLY A MONEY SCAM!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
reviews.comment: This site and app are horrible. Why match me with people that live an hour away? I\'ll never drive that far...ever for a girl...and you can\'t even change these settings...eHarmony what a joke, app crashes over and over and customer support just says to uninstall and reinstall... ..no sh!t ....morons. don\'t waste your time with this dating site IT DOES NOT WORK! piece of sh!t. Thieves!
reviews.author: Nathan Pond

reviews.title: Horrible app
reviews.comment: Everytime I try to submit my answers it says it\'s having trouble.  Cannot complete the questionnaire,  therefore cannot do anything. Won\'t allow me to add a pic. This app sucks and I\'m deleting it immediately.  Makes me not even want to use the site at all!
reviews.author: Samantha Christ

reviews.title: Photo issues
reviews.comment: I don\'t know why every photo i upload comes up turned to the side.  Anyone else have this problem?
reviews.author: Benjamin Colley

reviews.title: Too many glitches
reviews.comment: I constantly get timed out and have to reinstall and get a new password.
reviews.author: Harriet Berlin

reviews.title: Crap!!
reviews.comment: Your App is so terrible I may cancel your service entirely. It freezes, crashes, takes 300 taps to activate the link I pressed, I tap a link or button and nothing happens, when I go back into the app, it behaves as though everything worked and has moved me on to the next step. I am emailed updates that don\'t appear in the app for Two hours or more. It is awful!
reviews.author: Thomas Wilson

reviews.title: Review and uninstall
reviews.comment: You sent me a message saying that the site was free for the weekend of july 4th then when  i install and try to use you.ask for money free should mean free.....
reviews.author: Laurence Lindo

reviews.title: Painful
reviews.comment: Don\'t waste your time....frustrating and irritating
reviews.author: Liz Shere

reviews.comment: If there were *zero star* rating I\'d use it here.  I\'ve lost so many emails and profile updates I doubt I\'ll renew my membership. E/H\'s app is disappointing beyond words!
reviews.author: David Lewis

reviews.title: Not even one star
reviews.comment: I paid 150.00 yesterday and the website has been down since! The app too!  Dont get scammed by this bs!
reviews.author: Meka Day

reviews.title: Worthless
reviews.comment: I filled out the profile using my criteria. EHarmony continuously cautioned me that my answers would affect my search results. Finally, it told me it could not find me a match. I can tell you that I have dated many that fit my criteria. Why can\'t eHarmony find me even one.
reviews.author: Randy Logsdon

reviews.title: so far so good
reviews.comment: a few matches near me. liking it so far.
reviews.author: Tara Kirkpatrick

reviews.title: Bad
reviews.comment: Thought the reviews were bad, so I decided try it out. My experience seems worse than the feedbacks I read: couldn\'t even set up an account. Submitting registration info till eternity.
reviews.author: Joseph Obi
